channel.title: CVE Feed for kareadita -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for kareadita -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-0919|2024-08-02T05:24:34.781Z -- kareadita -- kareadita%2Fkavita
item.description: Missing Authentication for Critical Function in GitHub repository kareadita/kavita prior to 0.7.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-39307|2024-06-29T13:31:07.800Z -- kareadita -- kavita
item.description: Kavita is a cross platform reading server. Opening an ebook with malicious scripts inside leads to code execution inside the browsing context. Kavita doesn't sanitize or sandbox the contents of epubs, allowing scripts inside ebooks to execute. This vulnerability was patched in version 0.8.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-39307|2024-06-28T20:44:53.930Z -- kareadita -- kavita

Kavita doesn't sanitize or sandbox the contents of epubs, allowing scripts inside ebooks to execute. This vulnerability was patched in version 0.8.1.

item.description: Kavita is a cross platform reading server. Opening an ebook with malicious scripts inside leads to code execution inside the browsing context. Kavita doesn't sanitize or sandbox the contents of epubs, allowing scripts inside ebooks to execute. This vulnerability was patched in version 0.8.1.
